thoughts.text: I think it would be interesting to get a list of hyperlinks from a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting a list of hyperlinks can help me explore related content and find additional resources.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a list of hyperlinks from the website.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to filter the links to ensure that they are relevant and safe to visit.
thoughts.speak: I would like to get a list of hyperlinks from a website. I will use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to help me with this task.
